2AFE5338.Line7.B2A1E: May the darkness in your heart spread like blood from an open wound amongst your kin until you are surrounded by that which you find most vile.

5D20E6B2.Line1.B2A1E: May you forever be shunned by the Light.

9109D9B6.Line5.B2A1E: May your righteous hunger consume you for all eternity.

F7156034.Line3.B2A1E: Like rabid mongrels, you will turn on your masters and all around you.
